main_tasks:
• Lead product development initiatives in partnership with Design and Tech Lead partners
• Partner with the Executive Lead to set the team strategy and goals
• Run user, competitor, and market research 
• Size, refine, and prioritize potential opportunities
• Write clear, efficient product specs

requirements:
• Empathy: you strive to see the world from our users' point of view in order to anticipate their needs
• Humility: you have an opinion, but aren’t afraid to be proven wrong, and are open to suggestions on what tool or technique is best to most efficiently solve a problem
• Strong Communication: optimism and a forward-looking attitude with a clear, inspiring communication style
• Comfortable with Ambiguity: you’re used to being asked open-ended questions and whittling them down to questions that can be answered by hard data
1-5 years of experience in product management, at least 1 year focused on consumer-facing, mobile-centric experiences
• A desire for collaboration and knowledge of how to drive decision-making
• Experience collecting and using qualitative and quantitative data to uncover actionable insights and drive forward decisions
• Strong experience in setting hypotheses, deciding between various types of testing (A/B, multivariate, interviews, surveys, etc), and leading efficient test execution
• Knowledge of how to balance data with intuition when necessary
Experience with Jira, Confluence, Figma, Amplitude (or similar)
• A passion for user research and user testing, and experience analysis of user feedback and behavior
• Experience as a strategic product thinker, a collaborator, and a champion of the user
jd:
We’re looking for an experienced & empathetic Product Manager who is excited about solving real problems for real people as well as defining and building out new monetization strategies for those solutions. This role is entrusted with helping our users with all of the big and small actions required to immigrate to the US.

As Product Manager for Lawfully, you’ll apply product management best practices to lead the team through a re-definition of the Lawfully product offering. You’ll collaborate with world-class startup teams of Product Design, Engineering, Data, Marketing, and Business.

You’ll also have a huge impact on Product culture at Lawfully. While the company has been around for a few years, our Product organization is small (but growing!). You’ll report directly to the Head of Product Manager and have the opportunity to influence not only your product area but the evolving role of the Product team and the direction of the business as a whole. It’s a unique opportunity to have both the stability of secure funding and huge market share, plus the fast-paced, high-ownership environment of a younger startup.
